Hi,
Can you let me know when the last time the performance tests were run, and if
any changes have been made (e.g. running in UI vs non-UI)? This test literally
hasn't changed in over a month, and I can still run it fine locally.

The last run was last Friday. However, I just notice that this testcase has 
been failing for quite some time, I didn't notice it until now.

Just wondering, how did you run the testcase? Did you use the "JUnit Test Plug-
in" option in Eclipse? The difference here is that, on the perf machine, we run 
the performance testcases using the Eclipse Ant runner. That may have some 
impact.

Ok, found it. Test was not correctly tagged as UI. This must have been failing
for a while now. ;-)
